name: Mini Topless Tangerine - Whipped Argan Oil Refillable Firming Body Butter
categories: Bath & Body, Body Moisturizers, Body Lotions & Body Oils
about: What it is: An air-whipped full-body moisturizer with argan oil that rapidly soaks in, delivering juicy firmness, intense hydration, and an all-over glow.Fragrance Family: Fresh.Scent Type: Fresh Citrus & Fruits.Key Notes: Pixie Tangerine & Pink GrapefruitFragrance Description: In this sparkling, citrusy floral, Pixie Tangerine meets cute with yuzu, pink grapefruit, pineapple, and brown sugar. Itu2019s 1000 percent yum.About the Fragrance: As fragrance purists and planet lovers, Josie Maran uses only 100 percent plant-based essences: real fruits, nuts, woods, and plants. Because nothing beats the real thing..Highlighted Ingredients:- Argan Oil: An abundant source of essential fatty acids, antioxidants, and vitamin E..- Avocado Oil: Known to improve the look of skin elasticity and firmness, rich in antioxidants..- Shea Butter: Known to moisturize and soothe, helping skin stay supple...What Else You Need to Know: This body butter absorbs rapidly on dry skin for a velvety-soft and firming finish that lasts all day. Responsibly sourced argan is whipped to creamy perfection with 100 percent plant-based fragrances in a lightweight yet rich formula. With the refill system, top up your amber glass jar and reuse forever...Research Results: In a consumer perception survey of 39 people using the body butter on their thighs, stomach, and arms:.- 100% agreed their skin felt deeply hydrated and moisturized throughout the day after one use.- 97% agreed that the product provided an instant glow after one use.- 97% saw a noticeable improvement in firmness and tone after 2 weeks.Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: -Argan Oil:  An abundant source of essential fatty acids, antioxidants, and Vitamin E..-Avocado Oil:  Known to improve the look of skin elasticity and firmness; rich in antioxidants..-Shea Butter:  Known to moisturize and soothe, helping skin stay supple...Aqua (Water)**, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil*, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride**, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil**, Glyceryl Stearate**, Glycerin**, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter**, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyl Dimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Fragrance (Parfum)**, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice*, Camellia Sinensis (White Tea) Leaf Extract**, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract**, Symphytum Officinale (Comfrey) Leaf Extract**, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil**, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Flower Extract**, Squalane**, Beta-Carotene**, Citric Acid**, Tocopherol**, Allantoin**, Panthenol**, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate**, Polysorbate-60**, Cetearyl Glucoside, Cetearyl Alcohol**, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Limonene, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool, Citral.  ..*Organic..**Naturally Derived...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Massage generously into skin for an instant moisture boost..Josieu2019s tip:.-For best results, use after showering when pores are open and receptive to the whipped, velvety goodness....Recycling Instructions:.-Remove the cap of the jar, remove red liner from inside the cap, rinse both cap and jar thoroughly, and drop the separated jar and cap in your at-home recycling bin..-Liner can be recycled through TerraCycle. Flatten product box and drop in your at-home recycling bin..-Recycle pouch through TerraCycle....Refill Product Instructions:.-With the refill pouches, you can top up your gorgeous amber glass jar and reuse it forever. Each pouch refills the 6 oz. jar 2.25 times.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great travel size, and the scent is so fun and fresh! Is is like a sweet candy citrus. The formula is a nice, thick body butter like you'd want and expect, but not too thick because it still soaks into the skin fast enough that I'm not waiting to dry after applying or anything. My skin feels nice and smooth, but not greasy, just healthy.  The squeeze tube is honestly great too, you can control the amount that comes out easily if you have normal grip (might be a little harder if you have hand concerns) and I am glad to know I'll really be able to get every last drop. And it packs super easily into a small kit to bring to my boyfriend's for an overnight or on a weekend away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

I will definitely take it with me on my next trip.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This whipped cream exceeded my expectations! The texture is incredibly smooth and fluffy, feeling like a cloud on the skin. It glides on effortlessly, with a generous dollop covering a large area without feeling heavy or greasy.  The fragrance is a vibrant burst of tangerine that instantly uplifts your mood without being overpowering. Itu2019s the perfect scent for a quick pick-me-up, both in the morning and throughout the day.  As for the packaging, itu2019s simply adorable and travel-friendly. The mini size fits easily in my bag, making it a great companion for on-the-go hydration.  Application is a breeze; it absorbs quickly, leaving my skin feeling velvety soft within moments. I noticed a visible difference in my skin's appearanceu2014more hydrated and radiantu2014after just a few uses.  Overall, Josie Maran's Topless Tangerine is a delightful addition to my skincare routine; it combines luxurious hydration with a refreshing fragrance. If youu2019re looking for a body butter that delivers on feel and results, this is a must-try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: okay, so i just tried the josie maran mini whipped argan oil body butter in topless tangerine, and let me tell you, itu2019s a total game changer. first off, the texture is like a fluffy cloud. it feels so light yet super rich when you apply it, which is honestly the best of both worlds. you just wanna dive into it! the scent is everythingu2014imagine a fresh, juicy tangerine party. itu2019s bright and citrusy but not overwhelming. i love that it has hints of pineapple and brown sugar, making it smell like a tropical getaway. itu2019s definitely a mood booster whenever i put it on. the packaging is so cute and eco-friendly! it comes in this amber glass jar, which feels super luxe. plus, itu2019s refillable, so you can keep it forever and help the planet. win-win! applying it is super easy. it glides on like a dream and soaks in almost immediately, which is perfect for those mornings when youu2019re in a rush. after just a couple of minutes, my skin feels so velvety soft, and the glow is real. my skin looks so hydrated and radiantu2014itu2019s like itu2019s saying u201cthank you!u201d after using it for a week, i definitely noticed my skin feeling firmer and looking more toned. it feels like a little treat for my body every day. honestly, i canu2019t recommend it enough! if youu2019re into luxurious, clean beauty that smells divine, you need this in your life.

reviews.review_title: This body butter is divine ud83cudf4a
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells AMAZING! It has hints of orange and grapefruit and reminds me (as another reviewer has said) of the fruity trident gum. Yum! In terms of texture, this is the best body butter I have ever used. I used to use Sol de Janeiro, which I still like, but it doesn't hydrate my skin like Josie does. After just one application of this body butter, my dry skin went from flaky to smooth and soft. I didn't need to reapply during the day, despite the fact that it was cold and I was wearing a skirt! I felt so confident with smooth legs that I even wore heels to show them off. This body butter is a real confidence booster! I didn't need to worry about my body feeling dry, which allowed me to focus on the things I really wanted to do.  That being said, the scent (although DIVINE) does completely wear off within 20 minutes of application. I would buy this body butter again just for the texture alone, but the scent disappears so quickly, which is a shame, as it's so beautiful. Josie, please please please make a long lasting perfume of this fragrance!! I'm begging youuu

reviews.review_text: I am truly impressed with the quality, scent and texture of this Josie Maran Mini Whipped Argan Oil Body Butter in the delightful Topless Tangerine scent. This has really exceeded my expectations in every way. The texture of this body butter is simply luxurious. It's incredibly light and airy, yet supremely moisturizing, thanks to the infusion of argan oil. Upon application, it melts effortlessly into the skin, leaving behind a velvety-soft feel that lasts throughout the day. The Tangerine scent is a true delight for the senses. It's fresh, citrusy, and invigorating, yet not overpowering. The fragrance is subtle enough to be pleasant without being overwhelming, making it perfect for everyday wear. The scent lingers delicately on the skin, leaving me feeling refreshed and rejuvenated. I really appreciate the convenience of the mini size. It's perfect for tossing into my purse or travel bag, ensuring that I have hydration on hand wherever I go. Despite its compact size, a little goes a long way, making this mini body butter surprisingly long-lasting. I love that this body butter is formulated without parabens, sulfates, or phthalates which gives me peace of mind, knowing that I'm nourishing my skin with only the best. What truly sets this body butter apart is its ability to deeply hydrate and nourish the skin without feeling greasy or heavy. It absorbs quickly, leaving behind a subtle sheen that enhances the skin's natural radiance. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who is looking for body butter that has a luxurious texture, delightful scent, and provide nourishing properties as you will not be disappointed in this one.

reviews.review_text: This body butter, featuring a citrus tangerine scent, provides a refreshing and invigorating fragrance experience. With enough product for four full-body applications, its concentrated formula ensures effective moisturization. The travel-friendly size and packaging enhance its convenience, making it an appealing choice for those seeking a portable skincare solution with a zesty tangerine aroma.

reviews.review_text: This Josie Maran body butter smells so good. But it is not a ridiculously heavy fragrance. It is lighter and is closer to the skin. It stays on for hours. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: A must-have for soft, glowing skin!

I think the packaging is very pretty and the option to refill is great. However, when you take the lid off a lot of product gets caught on the lid and makes it look like the jar is half empty. The scent is OK. I was hoping for a more citrus scent to it.
